text: 맛있긴한데 아무리 끓여도 배추시래기가 살아있어서 넘 찔겼어요
trans_text: It's good, but no matter how much I boil it, the cabbage was still alive, so it got poked

text: 영통에 마땅히 아는 맛집이 없다면 추천
trans_text: If you don't know any good restaurants in Yeongtong, I recommend it

text:
갈 때마다 사람들이 많아서 북적북적.
특히 경희대 국제캠 학생들이 많아요.
장소가 넓어서 많은 사람들 모임 때 최상.
시장기가 돌 때 더 맛있는 뼈다귀해장국이죠.
trans_text: Every time I go, there are so many people, so it's crowded.. Especially, there are many students at Kyung Hee University International Campus.. The place is spacious, so it's the best for a lot of people's gatherings.. It's a bone hangover soup that tastes better when you're hungry.
